snippet: With nerves on edge over tensions with Iran, Israeli officials took the unusual step of announcing the test of antiballistic missile ahead of time.
abstract: Israel, in an unusual move, announces that it will conduct the first test of an advanced antiballistic missile system designed to intercept incoming missiles; departure from its traditional hush-hush approach to such tests is meant, at least in part, to avoid misunderstandings by other countries in the region and by Israelis themselves in the highly charged atmosphere surrounding Iran’s nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: With nerves on edge over tensions with Iran, Israeli officials took the unusual step of announcing the test of antiballistic missile ahead of time.

headline.main: Israel Plans Interceptor Missile Test and Gives Neighbors Early Notice
headline.print_headline: Israel Plans Interceptor Missile Test and Gives Neighbors Early Notice
